Name: Brightvale
Description: Land on the pointed star prize spot on the Wheel of Knowledge .

Name: Kiko Pop!
Description: Random when playing Kiko Pop .

Name: Skeith - King Hagan
Description: Awarded randomly when getting a score of at least 750 out of 1000 (A+) at Wise Old King .

Name: That's Not Rubbish
Description: Pick up a non junk item from the The Rubbish Dump , such as an apple core, petpets etc.

Name: Geraptiku - Deserted Tomb
Description: Randomly awarded while at the Deserted Tomb . You may visit once every 12 hours.

Name: Trudy Avatar
Description: This avatar is awarded when you win 100,000 neopoints from Trudy's Surprise. This occurs on your 25th consecutive spin.

Name: Snowager - Rawr!
Description: Randomly awarded when getting blasted by the Snowager .

Name: Aisha Scalawag
Description: Randomly awarded when finding the Buried Treasure .

Name: Forgotten Shore
Description: Awarded randomly when collecting a prize from the Forgotten Shore  daily.

Name: Avatar Collector
Description: Get into the top 50 on the Avatar Collector Daily High Score Table . You will need nearly all avatars.

Name: Beauty Contest
Description: Win first, second, or third place either in species or overall in the Beauty Contest.

Name: Brain Tree Quest
Description: Place in the top 50 on the high score table for Brain Tree Quest .

Name: Caption Contest - Funny
Description: Win the Caption Contest  on any 100th caption (e.g., 1000th, 1100th, 1200th, 1300th, etc).

Name: Caption Contest - Hilarious
Description: Rewarded to the golden prize winners in the monthly Caption Contest .

Name: Draik - Escape from Meridell Castle
Description: Get into the top 50 on the Escape from Meridell Castle Monthly High Score Table .

Name: Flee!
Description: Be in the top 50 on the Kiss the Mortog High Score Table  when trophies are awarded daily.

Name: Freaked Korbat
Description: Be in the top 50 on the Korbats Lab High Score Table  at the time trophies are awarded

Name: Lennies Rule
Description: Be one of the first 250 people to answer correctly in the Lenny Conundrum .

Name: Neopian Times Star
Description: Have at least 10 articles published in the Neopian Times  and then view your userlookup once your trophies are awarded.

Name: Neopian Times Writer
Description: As of July 2021 (Issue #941), receive this avatar when published in a 25th, 50th, 75th, or 100th edition of the Neopian Times. Prior to issue #941, and since issue #200, you had to be published in a 50th or 100th edition.

Name: Random Contest Winner
Description: Win either 1st place, 2nd place or runner up in a Random Contest .

Name: Site Spotlight
Description: Win the Site Spotlight.

Name: Godori
Description: Win 250 hands in Godori  in one month, before it resets.

Name: Neoquest II - Bionic Cybunny
Description: Defeat a Bionic Bunny in NeoQuest II .

Name: Neoquest II - Devilpuss
Description: Defeat a Devilpuss in NeoQuest II .

Name: Plushie Tycoon
Description: Complete Plushie Tycoon  with 50,000+.

Name: Borovan Dipped
Description: On Borovan Day, December 20th, feed your pet any item whose name contains the word "borovan," such as Apple Flavoured Borovan.

Name: Good Day At The Bank
Description: Deposit any amount of money into the bank on your active pets birthday.

Name: Grarrl Warrior
Description: Equip a Bony Grarrl Club to your Grarrl.

Name: HT - Richest
Description: Awarded for reading the book "Grimoire of Affluence" to your pet. This book may only be purchased at the Hidden Tower .

Name: Robot Vandagyre
Description: View the lookup of a Robot Vandgyre while having a robot painted petpet attached to your active Neopet.

Name: Royalboy Lutari
Description: Have 5 unique Lutari items in your inventory and view the lookup of a Royal Boy Lutari.

Name: Heermeedjet
Description: Defeat Heermeedjet in the 1-player Battledome . You cannot get the Meerouladen avatar if you have this avatar. To get Heermeedjet, you need to get him after collecting your prize for the Defenders of Neopia Series 1  'Meerca Brothers' task. NOTE: This avatar is currently unavailable while Defenders of Neopia is down.

Name: Meerouladen
Description: Defeat Meerouladen in the 1-player Battledome . You cannot get the Heermeedjet avatar if you have this avatar. To get Meerouladen, you need to get him after collecting your prize for the Defenders of Neopia Series 1  'Meerca Brothers' task. NOTE: This avatar is currently unavailable while Defenders of Neopia is down.

Name: Punchbag
Description: Lose to Punchbag Sid  when battling with your active pet. He randomly appears in the Battledome at certain, random, and rare times of a day - you'll know if he's there because a second Punchbag Bob will appear with a difficulty level of 100. Sid will randomly appear during battle when he's around.
